title: Calories in a Yellow Onion
meta_description: Discover calories in yellow onion, including full nutrition breakdown per medium onion and per 100g, with macros, fiber, and preparation tweaks for better meals.
assumptions: Medium yellow onion (~110g), raw, peeled; standard variety without added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by onion size, variety, freshness, and cooking method. Values are approximate; check produce labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium yellow onion has about 44 kcal and 10g carbs, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Roasted plain (vs. raw, slight moisture loss)

faqs.q: How many calories in one yellow onion?
faqs.a: About 44 kcal for a medium raw yellow onion (~110g).

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a yellow onion?
faqs.a: Roughly 10g carbs per medium onion, including 1.9g fiber and 4.6g sugars.

faqs.q: Do yellow onions have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Low in both: ~1.2g protein and 0.1g fat per medium onion.

faqs.q: Calories in cooked vs. raw yellow onion?
faqs.a: Raw is ~40 kcal/100g; cooking methods like sautéing add calories from oil or butter.

faqs.q: How does onion size affect calories?
faqs.a: Smaller onions (~70g) have ~28 kcal; larger (~150g) ~60 kcal. Scale by weight.
